text: aur jinaka haal yah hai ki jab ve koee khula gunaah kar baithate hai ya apane aap par zulm karate hai tau tatkaal allaah unhen yaad aa jaata hai aur ve apane gunaahon kee kshama chaahane lagate hain - aur allaah ke atirikt kaun hai, jo gunaahon ko kshama kar sake? aur jaanate-boojhate ve apane kie par ade nahin rahate
